channel.title: featured on Yukonwoodcraft - Cabinet making & custom furniture
channel.description: Recent content in featured on Yukonwoodcraft - Cabinet making & custom furniture

item.title: Blanket Chest
item.description: For this client a fir blanket chest was designed and fabricated. The chest features box joinery and a simple modern design. A oil/wax finish has been applied to preserve the natural wood look.

item.title: Kitchen Island
item.description: For this project a custom kitchen island was created. The kitchen island features an extra wide counter top with built in downdraft range as well as 2 book shelves on the backside of the island.

item.title: Kitchen Shelves
item.description: For this project a set of 4 fir floating kitchen shelves was created and installed.

item.title: Recessed wall cabinet
item.description: For this client a cabinet was created that is recessed in the wall. The cabinet is made of birch plywood and fir.

item.title: Bathroom Driftwood Shelf & Towel Rack
item.description: This project entailed designing and installing custom mounting solutions for 2 pieces of driftwood to create a basic shelf and a towel rack for a bathroom.

item.title: Park Benches
item.description: For this project a set of 9 matching park benches were created from Cedar wood.

item.title: Nook Table for Plants
item.description: For this project a custom table for plants was created. The table was made to fit into an existing corner nook in the clients house.
